results.title: Problems to be solved
results.brief_description: A restrained dramatic presentation of the problems of personal relationships and private worries in the office. A cleaner find mute evidence of the past day’s tensions as she moves around each desk. The office boy feels he is learning nothing; a clerk is extremely tense; a young mother worried about the child who must be left alone in the house; an executive is continually short-tempered and panicky; the manger has too full a timetable to do more than notice the existence of these problems.

results.title: Principles of routine composition
results.creator_credit: Mary Ann Reeves and Coaching Association of Canada
results.brief_description: Step by step instruction on how to compose a routine for synchronised swimming. Counting out music, land drills, coaching techniques, putting ideas together and practical methods are all considered.

results.creator_credit: Martin Rennolls and Jamaica Film Unit
results.brief_description: A record of the visit made to Jamaica by HRH Princess Margaret during her tour of the West Indies in 1955. Orchestral music by the Jamaica Military Band.

results.title: Primary adventure
results.brief_description: Made as part of the Inner London Education Authority’s contribution to the commemoration of the centenary of the Forster Education Act of 1870. The film shows modern methods of teaching and learning in primary schools during 1970.

results.title: President Kennedy in Ireland, June 26-29, 1963
results.brief_description: Made by Irish Television, this is an account of President John F. Kennedy’s visit to Ireland in June 1963. It is a straight record of President Kennedy’s return to the land of his forefathers - we see the welcoming ceremony, the motorcade through the streets of Dublin, visits to other principal cities and the informal visit to the family home.

results.title: Presenting Standard Triumph
results.brief_description: Survey of the Standard-Triumph motor car works, Describes the design, construction, assembly and testing of current range of automobiles. Advanced automation is used in the workshops including a Leo computer. Shows contribution of research teams to the development and design of new models.

results.title: Moulding with a three-part flask
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Foundry Practice”.
Use of a deep follow board, techniques of facing, ramming and venting a deep green sand core; how to use a check in a three-part flask; and the purpose and method of step-gating

results.title: Preparing a cupola for charging
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Foundry Practice”.
Explains how to recognise the end of a heat; the procedure for dropping bottom; and the procedures for preparing a cupola for its next heat.
